long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simplify Font Analysis with Ease
Font Analyzer mini is your go-to browser extension for effortlessly analyzing fonts on any webpage. With its intuitive interface, this tool provides all the details you need about the fonts used on a site. Whether you're a designer, developer, or content creator, Font Analyzer mini makes it easy to explore typography like never before.

[ Key Features ]
1. Drag-and-Select Simplicity
Click the extension icon, drag over any area of a webpage, and instantly view detailed font information. No need to struggle with complex developer tools!

2. Comprehensive Font Insights
Discover the font family, size, weight, and style of the text you select. Perfect for analyzing typography in-depth or recreating styles.

3. Tailored for Everyone
 - Designers: Gain inspiration from existing fonts or validate your design choices.
 - Developers: Easily fetch precise font data for faster stylesheet creation.
 - Content Creators: Optimize text readability and try out creative font combinations.

4. Accessible and Readability Focused
Improve web accessibility by analyzing text readability, ensuring a better user experience for everyone.

5. Privacy You Can Trust
Your data stays with youâ€”Font Analyzer mini processes font data locally without storing or sharing anything.

6. Optimized for Performance
Designed to handle even the most complex web pages efficiently, so you can focus on your work without lag.

[ How It Works ]
Launch Font Analysis Mode: Click the extension icon in your browser.
Select an Area: Drag over the text you want to analyze.
View Results Instantly: Get all the font details in a clean, organized layout.
For more information, updates, and support, contact us at contact@linqen.co.kr.
